languages.text: "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, простите, что прибыл так поздно! Уйму времени потратил на пустые склоки с казначеем, пока этот олух искал летописи поставок! И о нападении услышал, когда все уже началось — да еще и подъемник еле полз..."

traits.locale_text: "Ваше Сиятельство, простите, что прибыл так поздно! Уйму времени потратил на пустые склоки с казначеем, пока этот олух искал летописи поставок! И о нападении услышал, когда все уже началось — да еще и подъемник еле полз... Опять каких-то заморышей набрали, даже цепи нормально тягать не могут!" {n}Маска губернатора съехала на бок, волосы топорщатся, точно клочки сухой травы.{/n}

languages.text: "Your Celestial Highness, apologies for my late arrival! I wasted a great deal of time in idle squabbles with that oaf of a treasurer as he was looking for the shipment chronicle! I only heard about the attack after it had already begun, and the elevator might as well not have been moving at all, it was so slow..."
languages.original_text: "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, простите, что прибыл так поздно! Уйму времени потратил на пустые склоки с казначеем, пока этот олух искал летописи поставок! И о нападении услышал, когда все уже началось — да еще и подъемник еле полз..."

traits.locale_text: "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, apologies for my late arrival! I wasted a great deal of time in idle squabbles with that oaf of a treasurer while he looked for the supply records! I heard about the attack when it had already begun, and the elevator might as well not have been moving at all, it was so slow..."

"Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, apologies for my late arrival! I wasted a great deal of time in idle squabbles with that oaf of a treasurer as he was looking for the supply records! I only heard about the attack after it had already begun, and the elevator might as well not have been moving at all, it was so slow..."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, apologies for my late arrival! I wasted a great deal of time in idle squabbles with that oaf of a treasurer while he looked for the supply records! I heard about the attack when it had already begun, and the elevator might as well not have been moving at all, it was so slow... They've recruited another lot of weaklings who can't even pull the chains properly!"

"Your Celestial Highness, apologies for my late arrival! I wasted a great deal of time in idle squabbles with that oaf of a treasurer as he was looking for the shipment chronicle! I only heard about the attack after it had already begun, and the elevator might as well not have been moving at all, it was so slow..."

I only heard about the attack after it had already begun, and the elevator might as well not have been moving at all, it was so slow..."

"Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, apologies for my late arrival! I wasted a great deal of time in idle squabbles with that oaf of a treasurer while he looked for the supply records! I heard about the attack when it had already begun, and the elevator might as well not have been moving at all, it was so slow..."

"Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, apologies for my late arrival! I wasted a great deal of time in idle squabbles with that oaf of a treasurer as he was looking for the supply records! I only heard about the attack after it had already begun, and the elevator might as well not have been moving at all, it was so slow..."

languages.text: “真抱歉！我来晚了，来自上界的大人！那个愚蠢的财务大臣没找到货运记录，浪费了我太多时间！我是袭击开始之后才听说了这场事故，而且那该死的电梯实在是太慢了，简直就像是没动地方一样……”
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, apologies for my late arrival! I wasted a great deal of time in idle squabbles with that oaf of a treasurer as he was looking for the shipment chronicle! I only heard about the attack after it had already begun, and the elevator might as well not have been moving at all, it was so slow..."

traits.locale_text: “真抱歉！我来晚了，来自上界的大人！那个愚蠢的财务大臣没找到货运记录，浪费了我太多时间！我是袭击开始之后才听说了这场事故，而且那该死的电梯实在是太慢了，简直就像是没动地方一样……”

languages.text: «¡Su Excelencia Celestial, me disculpo por llegar tarde! ¡He perdido mucho tiempo peleándome con el incompetente del tesorero mientras buscaba la crónica del envío! No fui consciente del ataque hasta el último momento, y encima el ascensor iba tan lento que prácticamente estaba parado...».
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, apologies for my late arrival! I wasted a great deal of time in idle squabbles with that oaf of a treasurer as he was looking for the shipment chronicle! I only heard about the attack after it had already begun, and the elevator might as well not have been moving at all, it was so slow..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Su Excelencia Celestial, me disculpo por llegar tarde! ¡He perdido mucho tiempo peleándome con el incompetente del tesorero mientras buscaba la crónica del envío! No fui consciente del ataque hasta el último momento, y encima el ascensor iba tan lento que prácticamente estaba parado...».

languages.text: "Semavi Efendimiz, geç kaldığım için özür dilerim! O kaba hazinedarla sevkiyat vakayinamesini ararken boş kavgalarla bir sürü vakit kaybettim! Saldırıyı ancak başladıktan sonra duydum. Asansör de o kadar yavaştı ki hiç hareket etmiyormuş gibiydi..."
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, apologies for my late arrival! I wasted a great deal of time in idle squabbles with that oaf of a treasurer as he was looking for the shipment chronicle! I only heard about the attack after it had already begun, and the elevator might as well not have been moving at all, it was so slow..."

traits.locale_text: "Semavi Efendimiz, geç kaldığım için özür dilerim! O kaba hazinedarla sevkiyat vakayinamesini ararken boş kavgalarla bir sürü vakit kaybettim! Saldırıyı ancak başladıktan sonra duydum. Asansör de o kadar yavaştı ki hiç hareket etmiyormuş gibiydi..."

languages.text: 「天の閣下、到着が遅れまして申し訳ございません！出納係が積荷の記録を探していましたので、馬鹿な出納係と無駄な口論をして貴重な時間を浪費してしまいました！攻撃がすでに始まった後にそれについて把握しました。エレベーターが動かない方がましなぐらい遅かったもので…」
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, apologies for my late arrival! I wasted a great deal of time in idle squabbles with that oaf of a treasurer as he was looking for the shipment chronicle! I only heard about the attack after it had already begun, and the elevator might as well not have been moving at all, it was so slow..."

traits.locale_text: 「天の閣下、到着が遅れまして申し訳ございません！出納係が積荷の記録を探していましたので、馬鹿な出納係と無駄な口論をして貴重な時間を浪費してしまいました！攻撃がすでに始まった後にそれについて把握しました。エレベーターが動かない方がましなぐらい遅かったもので…」

languages.text: « Veuillez excuser mon retard, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! J'ai perdu un temps fou avec cet abruti de trésorier qui n'arrivait pas à mettre la main sur le manifeste de la cargaison ! Quand j'ai eu vent de l'attaque, elle avait déjà commencé, et cette saleté d'ascenseur qui n'en finissait plus d'arriver à destination... »
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, apologies for my late arrival! I wasted a great deal of time in idle squabbles with that oaf of a treasurer as he was looking for the shipment chronicle! I only heard about the attack after it had already begun, and the elevator might as well not have been moving at all, it was so slow..."

traits.locale_text: « Veuillez excuser mon retard, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! J'ai perdu un temps fou avec cet abruti de trésorier qui n'arrivait pas à mettre la main sur le manifeste de la cargaison ! Quand j'ai eu vent de l'attaque, elle avait déjà commencé, et cette saleté d'ascenseur qui n'en finissait plus d'arriver à destination... »

languages.text: "Eure himmlische Hoheit, verzeiht mein spätes Erscheinen! "Ich habe viel Zeit mit müßigen Streitereien mit diesem Dummkopf von Schatzmeister verbracht, während er die Lieferchronik suchte! Ich habe erst von dem Angriff erfahren, als er bereits begonnen hatte, und der Aufzug war so langsam, dass ich glaubte, er würde sich gar nicht bewegen ..."
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, apologies for my late arrival! I wasted a great deal of time in idle squabbles with that oaf of a treasurer as he was looking for the shipment chronicle! I only heard about the attack after it had already begun, and the elevator might as well not have been moving at all, it was so slow..."

"Ich habe viel Zeit mit müßigen Streitereien mit diesem Dummkopf von Schatzmeister verbracht, während er die Lieferchronik suchte! Ich habe erst von dem Angriff erfahren, als er bereits begonnen hatte, und der Aufzug war so langsam, dass ich glaubte, er würde sich gar nicht bewegen ..."
